dict.string: The `addImage(touch:)` function returns without doing anything if `touch.previousPlaceDistance` is less than a certain value. Change this value to 80: This will space out the ⭐️ graphics.

### Got it?
If you use a larger value, your touch will have to move farther before `touch.previousPlaceDistance` reaches that value, and the stars will be placed farther apart. Try a few different values.
[**Next Page**](@next)
